job_title: Adjunct Instructor in Morehead City, NC
pros: Students were great to work with!
cons: Administration was not pro-faculty, and often did not seem pro-student. Perhaps this has changed over time. When I was there, a small group of administration and faculty made most of the decisions and set the tone for the rest of the college. Input from others was not asked for or received well.

job_title: Adjunct Instructor in Morehead City, NC
pros: Beautiful surroundings, good people at the college.
cons: Adjunct life is always a bit fraught--we can't get more than a few classes and don't get paid a lot for those we do teach. There's been some turnover in admin lately so things can get chaotic. Maybe with new CEO things will be better.

review_title: It has been good.   They are very family oriented since I still have school-aged children.
